feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: v. 7.4.6 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.4.6 is available. Fixed regression in v.7.4.5 in Preferences
entry.summary: The v. 7.4.6 is available. Fixed regression in v.7.4.5 in Preferences

entry.title: v. 7.4.5 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.4.5 is available. Fixed a bug in synthetic time budget, added visualization of subtitles (see Preferences)
entry.summary: The v. 7.4.5 is available. Fixed a bug in synthetic time budget, added visualization of subtitles (see Preferences)

entry.title: v. 7.4.4 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.4.4 is available. Fixed the 'invisible player' bug
entry.summary: The v. 7.4.4 is available. Fixed the 'invisible player' bug

entry.title: v. 7.4.2 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.4.2 is available. Added behavioral category to output of export events and export aggregated fubctions. Fixed bugs in various functions when events are filtered
entry.summary: The v. 7.4.2 is available. Added behavioral category to output of export events and export aggregated fubctions. Fixed bugs in various functions when events are filtered

entry.title: Happy new year! v. 7.4.1 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.4.1 is available. Improved the sound spectrogram visualization and fix bug in player visualization after upgrade to v.7
entry.summary: The v. 7.4.1 is available. Improved the sound spectrogram visualization and fix bug in player visualization after upgrade to v.7
